results.title: Confidentiality Clause
results.rationale: Confidentiality obligations are clearly defined or explicitly excluded.

citations.quote: THIS AGREEMENT is entered into between Alpha Corp and Beta LLC. Effective Date: January 1, 2024. Term and Termination: This Agreement shall continue for one year unless terminated by either party with 30 days notice. Payment Terms: Beta LLC shall pay Alpha Corp $10,000 per year. Confidentiality: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality. Limitation of Liability: Liability is limited to fees paid under this Agreement. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement. Alpha Corp: _

results.title: Limitation of Liability
results.rationale: Liability limitations are explicitly stated or risk is escalated.
